full_summary:
##E6TOR-22NM01 Commercial Kitchen Equipment

###Solicitation Title

* English: E6TOR-22NM01 Commercial Kitchen Equipment
* French: E6TOR-22NM01 équipement de cuisine commerciale

###Reference Number

* Reference Number: WS3966182452-Doc3966374291
* Amendment Number: 8

###Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: WS3966182452
* Publication Date: 2023-04-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-31T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-05-31
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-05
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

###Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others
* Regions of Operation: None specified
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

###Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity Address: As above

###Contact Information

* Contact Name: Jeffrey Smallwood (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: jeffrey.smallwood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: None specified
* Contact Fax: None specified
* Contact Address: None specified

###Tender Description and Requirements

Canada is seeking offers to provide a National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for the supply, delivery and installation of Commercial Kitchen Equipment. Relevant documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-05-31T14:00:00 to ensure consideration. Please disregard any previous posting responses and closing times. All bids submitted after the specified closing time will be considered non-responsive. Evaluation will be based on the lowest price offered.

###Notice
